Package org.apache.fop.afp.svg

Contains a collection of AFP specific Batik bridges.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AFPBridgeContext An AFP specific implementation of a Batik BridgeContext
AFPGraphicsConfiguration Our implementation of the class that returns information about roughly what we can handle and want to see (alpha for example).
AFPGraphicsDevice This implements the GraphicsDevice interface as appropriate for an AFPGraphics2D.
AFPImageElementBridge An AFP specific implementation of a Batik SVGImageElementBridge
AFPTextElementBridge Bridge class for the <text> element.
AFPTextHandler Specialized TextHandler implementation that the AFPGraphics2D class delegates to to paint text using AFP GOCA text operations.
AFPTextPainter Renders the attributed character iterator of some text.
 

Package org.apache.fop.afp.svg Description

Contains a collection of AFP specific Batik bridges.
